name: Saily Seas
description:
Sail, glide and dive as you explore the magic and motions of SAILY SEAS.

◉ Fill your sails with the wind and navigate through rough seas
◉ Survive a perilous journey to discover secret locations
◉ Magical & Beautiful visuals
◉ Atmospheric & Serene sound design
◉ Compete to sail the furthest in the world
